laboratory_examinations.findings: The patient was euthyroid, had normal blood glucose levels with no features of insulin resistance, and a normal lipid profile.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Bone mineral density (BMD) by DXA scan
laboratory_examinations.findings: Z scores of -2.5 at the neck femur and -2.6 at the lumbar spine; corresponding T-scores were -2.5 and -2.6 respectively.
Two variants detected in the CYP19A1 gene: c.570delT (likely pathogenic) and c.344G>A (variant of uncertain significance).
